      • getCertiCode

        public java.lang.String getCertiCode(java.lang.String capCity,
                            java.lang.String birthDay,
                            java.lang.String sexCode)
        generate random number for idno.
        参数:
        capCity - province name or capital city name of the province.
        birthDay - birth date of the person to get idnos.
        sexCode - sex of the person to get idnos.

      • getCertiCode

        public java.lang.String getCertiCode(int cityCode,
                            java.lang.String birthDay,
                            java.lang.String sexCode)
        generate random number for idno.
        参数:
        cityCode - the city code of the chinese areas.
        birthDay - birth date of the person to get idnos.
        sexCode - sex of the person to get idnos.

      • veriCodeCalc

        public char veriCodeCalc(char[] chars)
        generate verify no for idno.

      • strLeftExpand

        public java.lang.String strLeftExpand(java.lang.String appointedStr,
                             int finalLen,
                             char fillWith)
        oracle lpad method in java.
        参数:
        appointedStr - original string
        finalLen - goal length of the string
        fillWith - chars to be filled with when string is shorter the goal length.

      • strRightExpand

        public java.lang.String strRightExpand(java.lang.String appointedStr,
                              int finalLen,
                              char fillWith)
        oracle rpad method in java.
        参数:
        appointedStr - original string
        finalLen - goal length of the string
        fillWith - chars to be filled with when string is shorter the goal length.
